alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:50PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Johns, northeastern Putnam, east central Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 350 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort Caroline to 7 miles east of San Mateo. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph, pea size hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Hastings, East Palatka, Unf, Fruit Cove, Arlington, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, World Golf Village and Baymeadows. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
